item.title: Adding wild zones?
item.dc:creator: @llamalord318 llamalord318
item.description:
@llamalord318 wrote:

is this the right code??? Just edit the area that I want to be wildy…

public boolean isInWilderness() { if ((absX >= 3123 && absX <= 3191 && absY >= 3507 && absY <= 3573) || heightLevel == 1) { return false; } else { return true; } }
